item.title: You CAN teach an old doc new tricks: Automate your project documentation using Sphinx & GitHub Actions
item.description:
Description

You've built an awesome API; time to give it some exposure! But, how do you keep a documentation website up-to-date as your code evolves? This tutorial will teach you how to write, generate, host, automate and version your documentation easily so it becomes part of your software development life cycle.
item.dc:creator: Olga Matoula

item.title: No More Raw SQL: SQLAlchemy, ORMs & asyncio
item.description:
Description

Managing a database and synchronizing service data representation with the database can be tricky. In this workshop, you’ll learn how to use SQLAlchemy, a powerful SQL toolkit, to simplify this task. We’ll cover how to leverage SQLAlchemy’s Object Relational Mapper (ORM) system, and how to use SQLAlchemy’s asyncio extension in your async services.
item.dc:creator: Aya Elsayed
